title: Definition of a power function
text: A power function is a function that can be represented in the form $$f(x)={kx}^p$$, where k and $$p$$ are real numbers and k is known as the coefficient

title: Definition of a power function
text: A power function contains a variable base raised to a fixed power, and this function has a constant base raised to a variable power.

title: Identifying power functions.
text: Is $$f(x)=2^x$$ in the form $$f(x)={kx}^p$$, where k and $$p$$ are real numbers and k is known as the coefficient?
